text: Consider the sequence of bits received by the receiver including the start and end flag: 01111110110110001011111010010000011011111000010110111111001001111110 Assume that the sender is using bit stuffing technique with flag equals to 01111110 to separate one frame for another. Which of the following statement is TRUE about the above sequence of bits? (a) The number of bits stuffed by the sender is 1 (b) The number of bits stuffed by the sender is 2 (c) The number of bits stuffed by the sender is 3 (d) There is an error in the sequence of bits of the frame
